document.full_text: japan's cabinet approved on friday almost $50 billion of spending for post-earthquake rebuilding, a downpayment on the country's biggest public works effort in six decades.
document.title: japan earmarks first $50 billion for post-quake rebuild
lines_and_colors: japan's cabinet approved on friday almost $50 billion of spending for post-earthquake rebuilding, a downpayment on the country's biggest public works effort in six decades.
